page.title: 01Sedgley
page.content: {Sedgley}is{5 square}kilometres.The {Bullring}is the centre,although it is not in the middle.Most of the houses in{Sedgley}are to the{south-west side of the Bullring.Some of the major roads that pass through{Sedgley are:The{A463}which is{Gospel End Road and passes{east,Dudley Road which passes south.The{A457}which is{Tipton {Road}and passes south.The{A459 which is the{Wolverhampton Road}and passes north and{Bilston Street}which passes east.Sedgley could be a{town}because we have a{Fine Fare,a school}and{major {Banks,but}if it was a{proper town}it would have a{Hospital,college,major {town hall,council offices,twenty four {hour police}and a{fire station,big {shops}and a{swimming}pool.I think {Sedgley}is a{town}because not all {towns}have{hospitals.Dudley}is the {nearest town}and is{south}and
